thumb.name: Knock. Knock! It's Christmas!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EKnock!%3Cbr%3EKnock!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWho's there?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBetty!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBetty who?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBetty watch out.%3Cbr%3EBetty not cry.%3Cbr%3EBetty not pout.%3Cbr%3EI'm telling you why...%3Cbr%3E'cause it's Christmas. Alyssa --%3Cbr%3Ethe season to be JOLLY!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope Your Christmas is Lots of Fun!

thumb.name: Dearest Little Angel
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3Efrom Grant %3Cbr%3Eto Sherrie...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...the dearest little angel%3Cbr%3Ethis side of heaven!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Finishing Touches
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ELisa. there's love in this greeting And special thoughts. too%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EBecause it's for Christmas. Because it's for you! Have a Wonderful Christmas%3Cbr%3E
